There is a lot of literature on neural networks openly available online. Here are a few useful sources on (deep) neural networks:
Books that provide detailed information about neural networks and ML in general:

Bishop, Pattern Recognition and
     Machine Learning, Springer-Verlag, 2006.

Haykin: Neural Networks,
     Prentice Hall, 3rd ed., 2009.
Lecture on convolutional neural networks by MIT.
